Qualifications required: Passed Lower Primary (Class-5th) Examination, able to read, write, and speak Odia
Skills required: Specific skills in Computer, Driving, Cooking, Electrician, Plumber, Barber, Cobbler, Carpenter, Tailor, AC mechanic, and other trades
Mode of application: Submit application forms directly at District Home Guard Office at RO, Keonjhar
